T02D1744:111b-1: se danta shr'i yo ga yo gi ni sv'arbh'u ta sam bho gashma sh'a na kalba n'a ma /
T02D1744:111b-3: dpal au rgyan gyi rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i
T02D1744:111b-4: rang byung gi longs spyod dur khrod kyi rtog pa
T02D1744:111b-5: zhes bya ba / bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1744:111b-6: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1744:111b-7: shar gyi dur khrod dbang po gtum drag dpag tshad bcu gnyis khor yug la /
T02D1744:111b-8: dpag tshad lnga zheng du gnas pa /
T02D1744:112a-0: @112a * // dbyibs ni shing rta rkang pa gsum pa lta bu /
T02D1744:112a-1: gtso bo klu sgrub snying pos byin gyis brlabs //
T02D1744:112a-2: shing ni gser mdog lo ma brgyar gyis shing //
T02D1744:112a-3: zhing skyong dkar po gri thod glang chen gdong //
T02D1744:112a-4: phyogs skyong brgya byin glang chen gdan rigs bcas //
T02D1744:112a-5: rdo rje mkha' 'gro pre ta yi dags za //
T02D1744:112a-6: byang chub chen po'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin //
T02D1744:112a-7: mtha' yas sngon po'i klu ni 'dud byed cing //
T02D1744:112a-8: thod pa brtsegs pa'i spyil bus kun bkang zhing //
T02D1744:112a-9: de na rnal 'byor pa'i rgyal po a'arya de ba la sogs pa shin tu mang ba bzhugs so //
T02D1744:112a-10: rnal 'byor ma ni mdzes ma dang snying stobs can ma la sogs pa'o //
T02D1744:112a-11: de dag ni rgyud gsang 'dus kyi rjes su 'jug cing klu sgrub yid la byed pa'o //
T02D1744:112a-12: lho'i dur khrod gshin rje 'bar ba'i nags tshal /
T02D1744:112a-13: dpag tshad drug cu gnyis khor yug / dpag tshad
T02D1744:112a-14: bco lnga rgyang grags gcig / dbyibs ni 'khor lo
T02D1744:112a-15: 'dra / dombi he ru ka yis byin gyis brlabs //
T02D1744:112a-16: bee d'ur+ya mdog lo ma brgyar gyes shing //
T02D1744:112a-17: zhing skyong nag po gri thod ma he gdong //
T02D1744:112a-18: phyogs skyong gshin rje ma he'i gdan rigs bcas //
T02D1744:112a-19: rin chen mkha' 'gro kang ka dbang bskur byed //
T02D1744:112a-20: cho 'phrul ston pa'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin //
T02D1744:112a-21: dung skyong dkar po'i klu ni 'dud par byed //
T02D1744:112a-22: thod pa rus pa dum bu'i spyil bus bkang //
T02D1744:112a-23: rnal 'byor pa ni aa wa dh'u t'i dang /
T02D1744:112a-26: gshin rje gshed nag po'i rjes su 'jug cing dombi he ru ka yid la byed do //
T02D1744:112a-27: nub kyi dur khrod chu bdag thod pa can dpag tshad bzhi bcu brgyad khor yug la /
T02D1744:112a-28: dpag tshad bcu gnyis zheng du gnas /
T02D1744:112a-29: dbyibs ni ban lang spyod lta bu zlum po ste /
T02D1744:112a-30: mkhas pa rta dbyangs kyis ni byin gyis brlabs //
T02D1744:112a-31: shing ni byi ru'i mdog can lo 'dab rgyas //
T02D1744:112a-32: zhing skyong dmar po gri thod chu srin gdong ;
T02D1744:112a-33: / phyogs skyong chu lha chu srin gdan rigs bcas //
T02D1744:112a-34: padma mkha' 'gro chos ston kun dha ra //
T02D1744:112a-35: lha las babs pa'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin //
T02D1744:112a-36: dmar po dga' bo'i klu rnams 'dud byed cing //
T02D1744:112a-37: ro rnams brtsegs pa'i spyil bus kun bkang zhing //
T02D1744:112b-0: de ni rnal 'byor @112b pa ni ku ku ri pa dang /
T02D1744:112b-1: rnal 'byor ma ni snying po'i rgyan ma dang /
T02D1744:112b-2: de dag thams cad ni rgyud sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i
T02D1744:112b-3: rjes su 'jug cing slob dpon rta dbyangs yid la
T02D1744:112b-4: byed pa'o // byang gi dur khrod lus ngan 'jigs byed dang //
T02D1744:112b-5: dpag tshad brgyad cu pa khor yug la /
T02D1744:112b-6: dpag tshad nyi shu zheng du gnas /
T02D1744:112b-7: dbyibs ni shing rta rkang pa bzhi pa lta bu /
T02D1744:112b-8: slob dpon padma can gyis byin gyis brlabs //
T02D1744:112b-9: ma rgad ljang mdog lo ma brgyar gyis shing //
T02D1744:112b-10: zhing skyong ljang gu gri thod khyu mchog gdong //
T02D1744:112b-11: phyogs skyong gnod sbyin khyu mchog gdan rigs bcas //
T02D1744:112b-12: las kyi mkha' 'gro las 'byor dam tshig la //
T02D1744:112b-13: bkra shis brtsegs pa'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin //
T02D1744:112b-14: ljang gu karko ta yi klu rab 'dud //
T02D1744:112b-15: ro yi spyil bus kun nas bkang ba'i zhing //
T02D1744:112b-16: de na rnal 'byor pa ni bzang po dang /
T02D1744:112b-17: rnal 'byor ma ni brdung ma la sogs pa'o //
T02D1744:112b-18: de dag rgyud dgyes pa rdo rje'i rjes su 'jug
T02D1744:112b-19: cing slob dpon mtsho skyes rjes su dran par byed
T02D1744:112b-20: do // shar lho'i dur khrod me mtshams dpal 'dren dpag tshad bcu gnyis khor yug la /
T02D1744:112b-21: dpag tshad gsum ni zheng du gnas /
T02D1744:112b-22: dbyibs ni skyes pa gzhon nu'i lag mthil lta bu ste /
T02D1744:112b-23: gtso bo sa ra ha yis byin gyis brlabs //
T02D1744:112b-24: shing ni aa mra'i mdog can lo 'dab rgyas //
T02D1744:112b-25: zhing skyong ser po gri thod ra skyes gdong //
T02D1744:112b-26: phyogs skyong me lha ra skyes gdan rigs bcas //
T02D1744:112b-27: sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ro langs sbyin sreg byed //
T02D1744:112b-28: padma spungs pa'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin //
T02D1744:112b-29: dkar po padma chen po'i klu rab 'dud //
T02D1744:112b-30: yi dags ro yi spyil bus kun bkang zhing //
T02D1744:112b-31: de na rnal 'byor pa ni ghu na ka na ka dang /
T02D1744:112b-32: rnal 'byor ma ni padma rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
T02D1744:112b-33: de dag ni rgyud bde mchog 'khor lo'i rjes su
T02D1744:112b-34: 'jug cing dpal sa ra ha pa rjes su dran
T02D1744:112b-35: par byed pa'o // lho nub kyi dur khrod dbang
T02D1744:112b-36: ldan ha ha sgrogs zhes pa dpag tshad drug khor
T02D1744:112b-37: par byed pa'o // yug la / dpag tshad bzhi ni zheng du gnas /
T02D1744:112b-38: dbyibs ni padma dkar po kha bye ba lta bu ste /
T02D1744:112b-39: dpal mchog nag po zhabs kyis byin gyis brlabs //
T02D1744:112b-40: aindra n'i la'i shing ni lo 'dab rgyas //
T02D1744:113a-2: phyogs skyong srin po yi dags gdan rigs bcas //
T02D1744:113a-3: dam tshig mkha' 'gro kyang rnams nye bar ston //
T02D1744:113a-4: bdud 'dul chen po'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin //
T02D1744:113a-5: gzi can dkar dmar mdog can klu rab 'dud //
T02D1744:113a-6: keng rus yi dags lo ma'i spyil bus gang //
T02D1744:113a-7: de na rnal 'byor pa ni bram ze stobs can gyi bu rnal 'byor pa gser mdog can dang /
T02D1744:113a-8: rnal 'byor ma ni bzhin khro ma la sogs pa'o //
T02D1744:113a-9: de dag ni rgyud snying po gnyis dang /
T02D1744:113a-10: rta mchog gi rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug cing dpal nag po zhabs rjes su dran par byed do //
T02D1744:113a-11: nub byang dur khrod bden bral mun chen zhes pa dpag tshad bcu bzhi pa khor yug la /
T02D1744:113a-12: dpag tshad bcu gnyis zheng du gnas /
T02D1744:113a-13: dbyibs ni chu'i ri mo 'khyil ba lta bu ste /
T02D1744:113a-14: mkhas pa ku ku ri pas byin gyis brlabs //
T02D1744:113a-15: shel gyi mdog can shing ni lo 'dab rgyas //
T02D1744:113a-16: zhing skyong sngon po gri thod sha ba'i mdog / phyogs skyong rlung lha sha ba'i gdan rigs bcas //
T02D1744:113a-17: thams cad mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i chos ston cing //
T02D1744:113a-18: gtsug phud dag pa'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin //
T02D1744:113a-19: padma dkar po'i klu ni rab tu 'dud //
T02D1744:113a-20: rtsva spyil rus pa'i rgyan spras kyis gang zhing //
T02D1744:113a-21: de na rnal 'byor pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /
T02D1744:113a-22: rnal 'byor ma ni zhing la sogs pa'o //
T02D1744:113a-23: de dag ni rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i rjes su 'jug
T02D1744:113a-24: cing dpal ku ku ri rjes su dran par byed
T02D1744:113a-25: do // byang shar gyi dur khrod rlung du ca
T02D1744:113a-26: co sgrogs zhes pa dpag tshad nyi shu khor yug
T02D1744:113a-27: do // la / dpag chad lnga ni zheng du gnas /
T02D1744:113a-28: dbyibs ni dge slong gi lhung bzed lta bu ste /
T02D1744:113a-29: mkha' 'gro rdo rje phag mos byin gyis brlabs //
T02D1744:113a-30: rin chen dung mdog shing ni lo 'dab rgyas //
T02D1744:113a-31: zhing skyong dkar sham gri thod rta yi gdong //
T02D1744:113a-32: phyogs skyong 'byung po rta yi gdan rigs bcas //
T02D1744:113a-33: 'jig rten mkha' 'gro bskyod cing gtor ma 'dzin //
T02D1744:113a-34: chos kyi 'khor lo'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin //
T02D1744:113a-35: nor 'dzin na ros mdog can klu rab 'dud //
T02D1744:113a-36: so phag ba rtsegs pa'i spyil bus kun bkang zhing //
T02D1744:113a-37: de na rnal 'byor pa ni dpal he ru ka pa dang /
T02D1744:113b-0: rnal 'byor ma ni bdag med ma dang bdud rtsi ma la sogs @113b pa'o ;
T02D1744:113b-1: / de ni rgyud m'a h'a m'a ya nam mkha'
T02D1744:113b-2: dang mnyam pa'i rjes su 'jug cing rdo rje phag
T02D1744:113b-3: mo rjes su dran par byed do //
T02D1744:113b-4: dpal au rgyan gyi rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor
T02D1744:113b-5: ma'i rang byung gi longs spyod dur khrod kyi rtog
T02D1744:113b-7: slob dpon birla [*birwa?] pas mdzad pa las btus pa /
